Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Cutaneous T-cell lymphoma that has not gotten better, has gotten worse, or has recurred (come back) during or after two systemic therapies.

Section.Para: Vorinostat is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
